hizbs.text: Ami e'i nagarira sapatha kari
ebam e'i nagarite apanara upara kona pratibandhakata ne'i.
Sapatha janakera o ya janma deya.
Niscaya ami manusake sramanirbhararupe srsti karechi.
Se ki mane kare ye, tara upara ke'u ksamatabana habe na
se baleh ami pracura dhana-sampada byaya karechi.
Se ki mane kare ye, take ke'u dekheni
ami ki take de'ini caksudbaya
jihaba o osthadbaya
bastutah ami take duâ€™ti patha pradarsana karechi.
Atahpara se dharmera ghamtite prabesa kareni.
Apani janena, se ghamti ki
ta hacche dasamukti
athaba durbhiksera dine annadana.
Etima atbiyake
athaba dhuli-dhusarita misakinake
atahpara tadera antarbhukta ha'oya, yara imana ane ebam parasparake upadesa deya sabarera o upadesa deya dayara.
Tara'i saubhagyasali.
Ara yara amara ayatasamuha asbikara kare tara'i hatabhaga.
Tara agniparibestita abasthaya bandi thakabe.
Sapatha suryera o tara kiranera
sapatha candrera yakhana ta suryera pascate ase
sapatha dibasera yakhana se suryake prakharabhabe prakasa kare
sapatha ratrira yakhana se suryake acchadita kare
sapatha akasera ebam yini ta nirmana karechena, tamra.
Sapatha prthibira ebam yini ta bistrta karechena, tamra
sapatha pranera ebam yini ta subin'yasta karechena, tamra
atahpara take tara asatkarma o satkarmera jnana dana karechena
ye nijeke sud'dha kare, se'i saphalakama haya.
Ebam ye nijeke kalusita kare, se byartha manoratha haya.
Samuda sampradaya abadhyata basatah mithyaropa karechila.
Yakhana tadera sarbadhika hatabhagya byakti tatpara haye uthechila.
Atahpara allahara rasula taderake balechilenah allahara ustri o take pani pana karanora byapare satarka thaka.
Atahpara ora tara prati mithyaropa karechila ebam ustrira pa kartana karechila. Tadera papera karane tadera palanakarta tadera upara dhbansa nayila kare ekakara kare dilena.
Allaha taâ€™ala e'i dhbansera kona birupa parinatira asanka karena na.
Sapatha ratrira, yakhana se acchanna kare
sapatha dinera, yakhana se alokita haya
ebam tamra, yini nara o nari srsti karechena
niscaya tomadera karma pracesta bibhinna dharanera.
Ata'eba, ye dana kare ebam khodabhiru haya
ebam uttama bisayake satya mane kare
ami take sukhera bisayera jan'ye sahaja patha dana karaba.
Ara ye krpanata kare o bepara'oya haya
ebam uttama bisayake mithya mane kare
ami take kastera bisayera jan'ye sahaja patha dana karaba.
Yakhana se adhahpatita habe, takhana tara sampada tara kona'i kaje asabe na.
Amara dayitba patha pradarsana kara.
Ara ami malika ihakalera o parakalera.
Ata'eba, ami tomaderake prajbalita agni samparke satarka kare diyechi.
Ete nitanta hatabhagya byakti'i prabesa karabe
ye mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
E theke dure rakha habe khodabhiru byaktike
ye atnasud'dhira jan'ye tara dhana-sampada dana kare.
Ebam tara upara kara'o kona pratidanayogya anugraha thake na.
Tara mahana palanakartara santusti anbesana byatita.
Se satbara'i santusti labha karabe.
Sapatha purbahnera
Sapatha ratrira yakhana ta gabhira haya
apanara palanakarta apanake tyaga kareni ebam apanara prati birupa'o hanani.
Apanara jan'ye parakala ihakala apeksa sreya.
Apanara palanakarta satbara'i apanake dana karabena, atahpara apani santusta habena.
Tini ki apanake etimarupe panani? Atahpara tini asraya diyechena.
Tini apanake peyechena pathahara, atahpara pathapradarsana karechena.
Tini apanake peyechena nihsba, atahpara abhabamukta karechena.
Sutaram apani etimera prati kathora habena na
sa'oyalakarike dhamaka debena na.
Ebam apanara palanakartara neyamatera katha prakasa karuna.
